name: Life's Chemistry
description:
Tom has fallen into a coma and has woken up in the Spiritual World. Here he meets his deceased brother, Gaspar.

Gaspar explains who he is and tells Tom a way to get him back to his world. There's a wise spirit called Minerva that have a spell to fuse both brothers, giving Tom some feelings he has lost at birth.

Work together to help these two brothers achieve their goals, Tom to wake up from his coma and Gaspar to help his brother, while getting to know eachother developing empathy bonds that they were never able to do so.

Controller:

This game is played in one controller, the left side controls Tom and the right side controls Gaspar. This is more explained in the settings menu.
